verses.verse: You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep<s%> go <S%H5080>astray,<s%> and <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself from them: you shall in any <S%H7725>case<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>again<s%> to your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be not <S%H7126>near<s%> to you, or if you <S%H3045>know<s%> him not, then you shall <S%H622>bring<s%> it to your own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it shall be with you <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> after it, and you shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him <S%H7725>again.<s%>

In <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H3651>manner<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H2543>ass;<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H8071>raiment;<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9>lost<s%> thing of your <S%H251>brother's,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6>lost,<s%> and you have <S%H4672>found,<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise:<s%> you <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself.

You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> down by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself from them: you shall surely <S%H6965>help<s%> him to <S%H6965>lift<s%> them up again.

The <S%H802>woman<s%> shall not <S%H1961>wear<s%> <S%H5921><s%> that which <S%H3627>pertains<s%> to a <S%H1397>man,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on a <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H8071>garment:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>so<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H6833>bird's<s%> <S%H7064>nest<s%> <S%H7122>chance<s%> to be <S%H6440>before<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> whether they be <S%H667>young<s%> ones, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7257>sitting<s%> on the <S%H667>young,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> on the <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H517>dam<s%> with the <S%H1121>young:<s%>

But you shall in any wise let the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> to you; that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4624>battlement<s%> for your <S%H1406>roof,<s%> that you <S%H7760>bring<s%> not <S%H1818>blood<s%> on your <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> any man <S%H5307>fall<s%> from there.

You shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> with <S%H3610>divers<s%> seeds: <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H4395>fruit<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> be <S%H6942>defiled.<s%>
You shall not <S%H2790>plow<s%> with an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and an <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
You shall not <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8162>garment<s%> of <S%H8162>divers<s%> sorts, as of <S%H6785>woolen<s%> and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H1434>fringes<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>quarters<s%> of your <S%H3682>clothing,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3680>cover<s%> yourself.
<S%H3588>If<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in to her, and <S%H8130>hate<s%> her,

And <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H5949>occasions<s%> of <S%H1697>speech<s%> against her, and <S%H3318>bring<s%> up an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on her, and <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and when I <S%H7126>came<s%> to her, I <S%H4672>found<s%> her not a <S%H1331>maid:<s%>

Then shall the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the tokens of the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1331>virginity<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate:<s%>

And the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and he <S%H8130>hates<s%> her;

And, <S%H2009>see,<s%> he has <S%H7760>given<s%> <S%H5949>occasions<s%> of <S%H1697>speech<s%> against her, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I <S%H4672>found<s%> not your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1331>maid;<s%> and yet <S%H428>these<s%> are the tokens of my <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1331>virginity.<s%> And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3256>chastise<s%> him;

And they shall <S%H6064>amerce<s%> him in an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H3318>brought<s%> up an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and she shall be his <S%H802>wife;<s%> he <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7971>put<s%> her away <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H571>true,<s%> and the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%> be not <S%H4672>found<s%> for the <S%H5291>damsel:<s%>

Then they shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> her with <S%H68>stones<s%> that she <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to play the <S%H2181>whore<s%> in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> so shall you <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7901>lying<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1166>married<s%> to an <S%H1167>husband,<s%> then they shall <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them <S%H4191>die,<s%> both the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman:<s%> so shall you <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> be <S%H781>betrothed<s%> to an <S%H376>husband,<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> her in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her;

Then you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H8147>both<s%> out to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of that <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%> that they <S%H4191>die;<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> she <S%H6817>cried<s%> not, being in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> he has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

But <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H781>betrothed<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>force<s%> her, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her: then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

But to the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> you shall do <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> <S%H1697><s%> there is in the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death:<s%> for as when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H7523>slays<s%> <S%H5315><s%> him, even <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter:<s%>
For he <S%H4672>found<s%> her in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H781>betrothed<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H6817>cried,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> her.

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not <S%H781>betrothed,<s%> and lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on her, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her, and they be <S%H4672>found;<s%>

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and she shall be his <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her, he <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7971>put<s%> her away <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1540>discover<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>
